plentry.pd:
Whether to capture a window on the screen:
: Capture the window.
: (Default) Capture the screen, not the window.
(macOS only) Display ID of the screen. Use this parameter only when capturing the screen on Mac devices.
(Windows only) Position of the screen to be shared relative to the virtual screen. Use this parameter only when capturing the screen on Windows devices.
Window ID. Use this parameter only when capturing a window.
Encoding parameter configuration for the screen sharing stream. See .

Position of the region to be shared relative to the entire screen. See . If not specified, the entire screen is shared. If the specified region exceeds the screen boundaries, only the content within the screen is shared. If the width or height in is set to 0, the entire screen is shared.

Whether to capture a window on the screen:
: Capture window.
: (Default) Capture screen, not window.
(macOS only) Display ID of the screen. Use this parameter only when capturing the screen on Mac devices.
(Windows only) Position of the screen to be shared relative to the virtual screen. Use this parameter only when capturing the screen on Windows devices.
(Windows and macOS only) Window ID. Use this parameter only when capturing a window.
(Windows and macOS only) Encoding parameter configuration for screen sharing stream. See .

(Windows and macOS only) Position of the region to be shared relative to the entire screen. See . If not set, the entire screen is shared. If the specified region exceeds screen boundaries, only the content within the screen is shared. If width or height in is set to 0, the entire screen is shared.

Whether to capture a window on the screen:
: Capture the window.
: (Default) Capture the screen, not the window.
(macOS only) The display ID of the screen. Use this parameter only when capturing the screen on Mac devices.
(Windows only) The position of the screen to be shared relative to the virtual screen. Use this parameter only when capturing the screen on Windows devices.
(Windows and macOS only) The window ID. Use this parameter only when capturing a window.
(Windows and macOS only) Encoding parameter configuration for screen sharing stream. See .

(Windows and macOS only) The position of the region to be shared relative to the entire screen. See . If not set, the entire screen is shared. If the shared region exceeds the screen boundaries, only the content within the screen is shared. If the width or height in is set to 0, the entire screen is shared.
